byte = 8
gigabit = 10 ** 9
bandwidth = gigabit / byte

# file_sizes = [10 ** 7, 10 ** 6]
file_sizes = [10 ** 7, 10 ** 6, 10 ** 5]
# file_sizes = [10 ** 7]

benchmark = Benchmark(
    bandwidth=bandwidth,
    duration=3,
    file_sizes=file_sizes,
)
benchmark.create_epochs()
